name: Iron Shield
desc: All heroes gain +20 max HP.

name: War Drum
desc: Launch cooldown reduced by 0.3s.

name: Explosion Rune
desc: Mage AoE radius +30px.

name: Steel Boots
desc: Warrior impact force +25%.

name: Enchanted Quiver
desc: Ranger spawns 5 arrows instead of 3.

name: Tome of Healing
desc: Priest heal radius +40px and +10 heal.

name: Blood Crystal
desc: All heroes deal +4 combat damage.

name: Banner of Rage
desc: Heroes in combat attack 15% faster.

name: Giant Sling
desc: Max launch distance +25px.

name: Lucky Coin
desc: Earn +3 bonus gold per battle.

name: Featherweight Charm
desc: Heroes have 20% less air friction (fly farther).

name: Thick Hide
desc: All heroes take 15% less combat damage.

name: Thorn Mail
desc: Enemies take 5 damage when they hit a hero.

name: Critical Eye
desc: Heroes have 15% chance to deal double combat damage.

name: Impact Rune
desc: All impact damage +20%.

name: Phoenix Feather
desc: One hero per battle cheats death with 1 HP.

name: Fifth Sling
desc: Launch one extra hero per battle.

name: Gold Magnet
desc: +2 gold for every enemy killed.

name: Warrior's Charge
desc: Warrior knocks back all nearby enemies on combat entry.

name: Chain Lightning
desc: Mage impact chains to 2 additional enemies for 50% damage.

name: Poison Arrows
desc: Ranger arrows apply 8 damage over 2 seconds.

name: Resurrection Tome
desc: Priest revives the first fallen hero at 50% HP.

name: Bard's Encore
desc: Bard charm duration +2 seconds.

name: Stone Breaker
desc: Impact deals +30% damage to stone blocks.

name: Berserker Helm
desc: Heroes below 30% HP deal double combat damage.

name: Wolf Totem
desc: Druid summons 1 additional wolf.

name: Shadow Cloak
desc: Rogue pierces through 2 blocks instead of 1.

name: Campfire Kit
desc: REST nodes also grant +15 max HP to all heroes.

name: Battle Medic
desc: Heroes heal 5 HP per enemy killed.

name: Guardian Angel
desc: Revive cooldowns reduced by 1 at run start.
